Namespace: gradeCalc

dtps.gradeCalc

Grade calculation object for DTPS
Properties:
Name Type Description
letters Array.<string> An array of letters that can be returned from highest -> lowest
percentageEq Array.<number> The percentage equivalent of each letter for visual representations of grades
params object Parameters for each type of grade calculation, such as requirements for each criteria
